songs.title: Simple
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I was simple (simple)
I was simple (simple)
When I laid beside you
Now I know it's all through
It's not true

[Verse 2]
I was simple (simple)
I was simple (simple)
I was simple (simple)
Since the day I found you
Time just meant an old rule
Now it's true

[Chorus]
Loving you is groovin'
Don't you know it's foolish?
Just to say I think of those lies
Just to pray you're still mine
Just to cry we've been right

[Bridge]
I was simple (simple)
I was simple (simple)
Simple
Simple
Since the day I found you
Time just meant an old rule
Now it's true

[Chorus]
Loving you is groovin'
Don't you know it's foolish?
Just to say I think of those lies
Just to pray you're still mine
Just to cry we've been right

[Outro]
I was simple (simple)
I was simple (simple)
Simple
Simple
